control_attributes.Control: AC-17 (2) PROTECTION OF CONFIDENTIALITY / INTEGRITY USING ENCRYPTION
control_attributes.control_description: The information system implements cryptographic mechanisms to protect the confidentiality and integrity of remote access sessions.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization employs [Selection: full-device encryption; container encryption] to protect the confidentiality and integrity of information on [Assignment: organization-defined mobile devices].

Control Statement: The information system implements cryptographic mechanisms to protect the confidentiality and integrity of remote access sessions.
Control Name: AC-17 (2) PROTECTION OF CONFIDENTIALITY / INTEGRITY USING ENCRYPTION
